project_abstract.cdata: The First Education Project will comprise: (i) the construction, furnishing and equipping of 9 new secondary schools; and (ii) the improvement, construction of, extensions to, and supplementary furnishing and equipping of, 56 existing secondary schools, 2 primary teacher training colleges, 2 higher teacher training colleges and technical colleges.
